Comment: Welcome readers, the purpose of this annotation isn't to "show how good I am" or to brag about beating an opponent with a rating 600 points south of mine. Mostly I just liked the look of the final picture, and wanted to share it. Hope you enjoy!
Looks a bit odd, but seems playable.

The free pawn was just too irresistable...
